title: Lab technique - next step after rinsing buret

content.question: When a buret is rinsed before a titration, which of the techniques below is the best procedure?

choices.label: Rinse the buret one time with some of the titrant solution.
Rinse the buret two times: once with some of the titrant solution, then once with distilled water.
Rinse the buret two times: each time with some of the titrant solution.
Rinse the buret two times: each time with distilled water.

content.answer: Rinse the buret two times: each time with some of the titrant solution.

skill.text: 2.C: Identify experimental procedures that are aligned to a scientific question (which may include a sketch of a lab setup).
